EmailTemplate.name: CMI_Invite_User_PV
EmailTemplate.subject: Invite Users to Cummins Connected Solutions.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Connected Solutions
{!IAM_Application__c.IAM_Account_Name__c} is now approved to view equipment data on Cummins Connected Solutions. You are currently set as your companyâ€™s primary contact.
As the primary contact, you are the only user authorized to invite additional users to view equipment data on Connected Solutions. Inviting users will enable your employees to access the Connected Solutions portal and Connected Diagnostics mobile app.
Invite Users
Thank you for being a Cummins customer. Cummins Connected Solutions connectedsol.support@cummins.com https://cumminsengines.com/connecteddiagnostics If you have trouble clicking the button, please click to Invite additional users. This auto-generated e-mail invitation is sent from Cummins Connected Solutions.
